item.description:
The RedSoxNatives participated in one of these events in December with about 90 attending. 

Just think of it as your own social network! BeantownSocial.com is hosting this event at Red Sky, next to Faneuil Hall in Boston. This social networking event brings entrepreneurs  together involved in social media and interested in semi-professional networking, making friends and getting the heck out from behind your computer for a change. 

A line up of picky foods from Red Sky is included along with a reserved section to mingle in.

Please email Kristen@beantownsocial.com with why they should showcase your business if your business has a giveaway for door prizes. If you do have a giveaway there will be a breakaway at 7:45pm in order to introduce your business and giveaway your product/service.

***If you plan to attend you must register on Eventbrite at http://www.eventbrite.com/event/3055395771   

Also please sign up for updates from Beantown Social on Facebook and follow at Twitter: @BeantownSocial

his is a 21 plus event.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the reserved space
item.name: Beantown SOCIAL Networking at Red Sky with Kristen Haley
